user.title: AVR details
user.description: Enter the details for the Pioneer AVR:

data.sources: Name to AVR source ID mapping (JSON dict | "current" to copy current)
data.zone_2_sources: Zone 2 available sources (JSON list | "default" to copy default)
data.zone_3_sources: Zone 3 available sources (JSON list | "default" to copy default)
data.zone_z_sources: HDZone available sources (JSON list | "default" to copy default)
data.max_source_id: Maximum source ID that automatic source identification will check [max_source_id]
data.ignore_zone_2: Don't create entity for Zone 2 (on next restart) [ignore_zones]
data.ignore_zone_3: Don't create entity for Zone 3 (on next restart) [ignore_zones]
data.ignore_zone_Z: Don't create entity for HDZone (on next restart) [ignore_zones]

data.max_volume: Maximum volume units for Main Zone [max_volume]
data.max_volume_zonex: Maximum volume units for other Zones [max_volume_zonex]
data.power_on_volume_bounce: Main Zone power on volume reporting workaround (required on VSX-930 with initial volume set) [power_on_volume_bounce]
data.ignore_volume_check: Don't check volume when determining whether zone exists (on next restart) [ignore_volume_check]
data.volume_step_only: Emulate volume level set by stepping volume up/down (for VSX-S510) [volume_step_only]

data.disable_autoquery: Disable auto queries on init for all functions apart from basic functionality (power, source, volume and mute) [disable_autoquery]
data.debug_listener: Enable debug messages for listener task [debug_listener]
data.debug_responder: Enable debug messages for responder task [debug_responder]
data.debug_updater: Enable debug messages for updater task [debug_updater]

error.invalid_sources: Invalid JSON dictionary specified for source name mapping
